title: Their Lonely Betters - suggests in final stanza

content.question: In the final stanza, the speaker most directly suggests that

choices.label: language is essential to what it means to be human
language is less reliable than people believe
peopleâ€™s feelings can be expressed only in language
language tends to make people less sympathetic to one another

content.answer: language is essential to what it means to be human

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
